name: Nyxara
backStory: Born in the darkest depths of the Eclipsed Dominion, Nyxara was a child of the shadows. She grew up amidst the ruins, learning to harness the darkness that surrounded her. As she matured, her skills with the blade became legendary, and she rose to power as a feared warlord. Now, with the arrival of Oros, the Unyielding Light, Nyxara must unite the fractured factions of the Shadowed Dominion to fend off the radiant invaders and preserve their way of life.
